description: 5 ingredients create these soft textured and nutty fritters.
name: Banana & Macadamia Fritters Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium banana, one for garnish, peel and mash one
50g macadamia nuts, crushed, reserve small portion for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine eggs, mashed banana, nuts and allspice together gradually adding the flour last.
Divide the mixture into about 6 to 8 fritters.
Heat up a pan suitable to shallow fry and cook for 6 minutes while turning regularly.
Remove from the oil and place on a plate with some kitchen paper to remove some excess oil before serving.
Garnish with sliced strawberries, bananas and nuts and drizzle with honey.
